subject_name.description: Name of the insurer or contractor.

subject_identifier.description: Optional identifier like a license number.

image_url.description: URL of an optional image of the incident.

file_url.description: URL of the uploaded permit document.

uploaded_at.description: Timestamp when the permit was uploaded.

database.instructions: Use 'reviews_v1' for reviews, 'incidents_v1' to log community-reported issues, and 'la_permits_v1' to capture City of LA permit uploads.
